title: Bachelor of Science in Psychology
description: A Psychology degree from Kennesaw State provides you with the pathway to a variety of psychology careers. You can work in social and community services, human resources, rehabilitation services, or pursue employment in non-psychological fields such as business, criminal justice, and education. You will also have the opportunity to continue your education for a master's degree to advance in your position in psychology.
careers: Admissions Counselor, Alumni Director, Benefits Manager, Casework, Child Development Specialist.
